WorkItem.ClosedComment:
Hi,

I'm closing this issue, as it's likely that the problem can be solved by using the links provided by Diego Poza (by placing a link to the ServiceReferences.ClientConfig file in the Shell project of the Prism application).

You might also find the following blog post useful, which provides guidance on how to use WCF Services with Prism Silverlight applications:
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi/2011/10/using-wcf-services-in-prism-silverlight-applications/

For further support on the subject, you could create a thread in the discussions section (http://compositewpf.codeplex.com/discussions).

Thanks,

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi
